features.title: Detailed Features
features.subtitle: Discover all the tools you need to grow your coaching business

clientManagement.title: Complete Client Management
clientManagement.desc: Centralize clients and prospects: contact info, goals, level, medical conditions. Manage the full journey from contact to retention.

clientPortal.title: Dedicated Client Portal
clientPortal.desc: Each client has their own personal space to view programs, track progress, access nutrition plans, and communicate with their coach.

programs.title: Personalized Programs
programs.desc: Create custom programs adapted to all practices for every client. Access an exercise library and templates to save time.

messaging.title: Integrated Messaging
messaging.desc: Direct and secure communication with your clients. Instant messages, file sharing, and centralized conversation tracking.

calendar.title: Smart Calendar
calendar.desc: Simplified planning with Google Calendar synchronization. Online booking, automatic reminders, and slot management.

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.desc: Visualize your clients' evolution: weight, measurements, progress photos. Detailed charts and analysis for professional monitoring.

nutrition.title: Nutrition Plans
nutrition.desc: Personalized meal plans with automatic macro calculation. Recipe library and integrated nutrition templates.

billing.title: Simplified Billing
billing.desc: Create and send invoices in one click. Secure online payments via Stripe. Automatic revenue tracking and reminders.

reports.title: Daily Reports
reports.desc: Receive detailed reports from your clients: workout, nutrition, sleep, mental state. Adapt monitoring proactively.

library.title: Libraries & Automation
library.desc: Access rich libraries of pre-designed programs and nutrition plans. Automate repetitive tasks to focus on coaching.
